chatPlus.linePriority.tooltip: Priority of line colors from (Hover/Bookmark/Highlight/etc). The priority with the lowest number will be rendered on top.
key.noScroll.tooltip: Hold this key to disable scrolling. Created for scrolling through large chat hover messages with scrollable tooltips.
key.fineScroll.tooltip: Hold this key to scroll 1 line at a time. (Default 7 lines per scroll)
key.largeScroll.tooltip: Hold this key to scroll 21 lines at a time. (Default 7 lines per scroll)
key.moveChat.tooltip: Hold this key to move the chat. Click and drag the chat to move it. Click and drag the top edge/right edge/top right corner of the chat to rescale it.
key.peekChat.tooltip: Hold this key to peek the chat. The chat will be shown while the key is held outside of the chat screen.
key.speechToText.ptt.tooltip: Hold down the key for the model to listen.
key.speechToText.quickSend.tooltip: Press this key shortly after finishing speaking to instantly send the message.
chatPlus.title: ChatPlus
chatPlus.chatSettings.title: Chat Settings
chatPlus.chatSettings.tooltip: Change chat settings similar to vanilla Minecraft.
chatPlus.chatSettings.chatTextSize.toolt: Changes the chat text size. This does not effect width/height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.maxMessages.toolti: The maximum number of messages to store. Minecraft's default is 100. Increasing this will increase memory usage.
chatPlus.chatSettings.maxCommandSuggesti: The maximum number of commands to suggest. Minecraft's default is 10. The suggestions might go past your screen height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.textOpacity.toolti: Changes the opacity of the chat text.
Changes the opacity of the chat background.
chatPlus.chatSettings.unfocusedHeight.to: Changes the height of the chat when it is unfocused. Percent is based on focused height.
chatPlus.chatSettings.lineSpacing.toolti: Changes the spacing between lines of text in chat.
Changes the way timestamps are displayed in over messages in chat.
The position of the message when jumping to it.
chatPlus.chatSettings.messageDirection.t: The direction in which chat lines are rendered
chatPlus.hideChat.title: Hide Chat
chatPlus.hideChat.showWhenFocused.toggle: If hide chat is enabled, this will show the chat when it is focused.
chatPlus.hideChat.showHiddenOnScreen.tog: If the chat is hidden then 'Chat Hidden' will be displayed on the top center of the screen.
chatPlus.hideChat.key.tooltip: Shortcut to toggle hiding the chat.
chatPlus.compactMessages.title: Compact Messages
chatPlus.compactMessages.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables if messages should be compacted
chatPlus.compactMessages.refreshFadeTime: Enables/Disables whether or not the fade timer of newly compacted messages are reset.
chatPlus.compactMessages.ignoreTimestamp: Enables/Disables whether or not timestamps are ignored when matching messages to compact. Compacted messages will have their timestamps updated. Only applies if Timestamp Mode is not set to NONE.
chatPlus.compactMessages.searchAmount.to: The amount of previous messages to search when compacting messages. 1 = only compact consecutive messages.
chatPlus.scrollbar.title: Scrollbar
chatPlus.scrollbar.invertedScrolling.too: Inverts the scrolling direction of the scrollbar.
chatPlus.animation.title: Animation
chatPlus.animation.newMessageTransitionT: The time it takes for a new message to transition in.
chatPlus.chatWindowsTabs.title: Chat Windows/Tabs
chatPlus.chatWindow.backgroundColor.tool: Background color of the chat window.
chatPlus.chatWindow.outline.tooltip: Enables/Disables the outline of the chat window.
chatPlus.chatWindow.outlineColor.tooltip: Outline color of the chat window when focused.
chatPlus.chatTabs.title: Chat Tabs
Enables/Disables scrolling left/right to cycle through tabs.
chatPlus.chatTabs.arrowCycleTabEnabled.t: Enables/Disables using the left/right arrow keys to cycle through tabs.
chatPlus.chatTabs.moveToTabWhenCycling.t: Enables/Disables moving to the next tab when cycling through tabs.
chatPlus.chatTabs.name: Name
chatPlus.chatTabs.formatted.toggle.toolt: Whether to use the formatted message or the raw message.
chatPlus.chatTabs.autoPrefix.tooltip: Text to prepend when sending messages in this tab.
chatPlus.chatTabs.priority.tooltip: Priority of the tab. When adding messages, tabs are sorted by highest priority first. By default, if a message got added to a tab, tabs with a lower priority will be skipped.
chatPlus.chatTabs.alwaysAdd.tooltip: Always add messages to this tab regardless of priority, this tab's priority is also ignored.
chatPlus.chatTabs.skipOthers.tooltip: Skip other tabs if this tab is matched. Overrides Always Add.
Whether to use the formatted message or the raw message. Use & for color codes.
chatPlus.messageFilter.title: Filter Highlights
chatPlus.messageFilter.tooltip: Customize what messages are highlighted in chat.
chatPlus.messageFilter.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables the highlighting filter messages in chat.
chatPlus.messageFilter.pattern.tooltip: Regex Pattern (Based on Raw Message, No style/formatting)
chatPlus.messageFilter.changeColor.toolt: Enables/Disables changing the background line color of the message.
Enables/Disables playing a sound when a message is matched.
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.title: Hover Highlight
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables highlighting the message line your mouse is over.
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.mode.tooltip: The mode of the hover highlight. Brighter will make the message brighter, Custom Color will use the custom color.
chatPlus.hoverHighlight.color.tooltip: The color of the hover highlight if mode is Custom Color.
chatPlus.bookmark.title: Bookmark Messages
chatPlus.bookmark.color.tooltip: The background color of the bookmarked messages.
chatPlus.bookmark.key.tooltip: Bookmarks currently selected messages or message hovered over.
chatPlus.bookmark.textBarElement: Click to toggle showing bookmarked messages.
Adds/Removes the find message text bar element (Box with 'B' to the right of input box).
chatPlus.bookmark.show.key.tooltip: Shortcut to toggling showing bookmarked messages. If it is the same as the bookmark key, this will only work when used not hovering over a chat line.
chatPlus.bookmark.auto.title: Auto Bookmark
chatPlus.bookmark.auto.pattern.tooltip: Regex Pattern to automatically bookmark messages.
chatPlus.findMessage.title: Find Message
chatPlus.findMessage.highlightInputBox.t: Click to toggle the find option. Click on any message to jump to it.
Enables/Disables highlighting the input box when finding messages is active.
chatPlus.findMessage.textBarElement.togg: Adds/Removes the find message text bar element (Box with 'F' to the right of input box).
chatPlus.copyMessage.title: Copy Message
chatPlus.copyMessage.noFormatting.toggle: Enable/Disable removing formatting when copying messages, relevant for older servers that use formatting codes.
chatPlus.copyMessage.key.tooltip: Copies currently selected messages or message hovered over.
chatPlus.screenshotChat.title: Screenshot Chat
chatPlus.screenshotChat.tooltip: Click to take a screenshot of the chat. 3s Cooldown.
chatPlus.screenshotChat.toggle.tooltip: Enables/Disables being able to take a screenshot of the chat.
chatPlus.screenshotChatTextBarElement.to: Enables/Disables the screenshot text bar element (Box with 'S' to the right of input box).
chatPlus.screenshotChat.line.key.tooltip: Takes a screenshot of the currently selected messages or message hovered over.
chatPlus.screenshotChatAutoUpload.toggle: Enables/Disables auto uploading screenshots to imgur.
chatPlus.playerHeadChatDisplay.title: Player Head Chat Display
chatPlus.playerHeadChatDisplayEnabled.to: Enables/Disables showing player heads next to chat messages.
chatPlus.playerHeadChatDisplayShowOnWrap: Enables/Disables showing player heads on wrapped messages.
chatPlus.playerHeadChatDisplayOffsetNonH: Enables/Disables offsetting non-head messages as if they were head messages.
Enables/Disables offsetting non-head messages on wrapped messages.
chatPlus.chatKeyBinds.tooltip: Hold down bound keys while chat is focused to perform actions.
chatPlus.translator.title: Translator
chatPlus.translator.match.tooltip: Regex Pattern that matches chat messages to translate.
chatPlus.translatorTextBarElement.toggle: Enables/Disables the translate text bar element with the language to translate to.
chatPlus.translator.senderNameGroupIndex: Group index of the sender's name in the regex pattern.
chatPlus.translator.translateSelf.toolti: Language to use when translating your own messages.
chatPlus.translator.translateSpeak.toolt: Language your messages are translated to.
Language your messages are translated to. Click to toggle.
chatPlus.translator.translateSpeakPrefix: Text to prepend that will not get translated.
chatPlus.translator.keepOnAfterChatClose: Keep Translate on After Chat Close
Enables/Disables whether the translator should automatically be on after closing the chat with it on.
chatPlus.translator.translateKey.tooltip: Shortcut to open chat with the translator automatically on.
chatPlus.translator.translateToggleKey.t: Shortcut to toggle the translator while the chat is open.
chatPlus.translator.translateClick.toggl: Enables/Disables control left clicking on currently selected messages or message hovered over. This will translate the whole message (unwrapped).
chatPlus.speechToText.toInputBox.toggle: Auto Add Message to Input Box
Enables/Disables automatically adding non quick sent speech to text messages to the input box.
chatPlus.speechToText.speechToTextSample: Sample rate of the audio. Must match the sample rate of your microphone.
chatPlus.speechToText.microphone.tooltip: The microphone to use for speech to text.
chatPlus.speechToText.selectedAudioModel: Audio model to use for speech to text.
chatPlus.speechToText.speechToTextTransl: Enables/Disables auto translating speech to text messages.
Auto Add Translated Message to Input Box
Enables/Disables automatically adding non quick sent translated speech to text messages to the input box.
Language to translate speech to text messages to.
